content.rendered:
Privacy & Policies For Customers |

Privacy Policy

Introduction

Welcome to Vehismart Clean Pvt Ltd ("Company," "we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and safeguarding your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your personal information when you use our doorstep vehicle cleaning services or interact with our website, mobile applications, or other services (collectively, the "Services").

Information we collect

a. Personal Information

  • Contact information (such as name, address, email address, and phone number).
  • Vehicle information (such as make, model, and license plate number).
  • Payment information (such as credit card or other payment details).
  • Communication preferences.

b. Usage Information

  • Information about your interactions with our Services, including pages viewed, actions taken, and the dates and times of your visits.

c. Location Information

  • We may collect information about your location when you use our mobile application or request our services.

We may use your personal information for the following purposes

  • To provide and maintain our doorstep vehicle cleaning services.
  • To process payments and complete transactions.
  • To communicate with you, including responding to your inquiries and sending service-related notifications.
  • To improve and personalize our Services.
  • To comply with legal and regulatory obligations.
  • To comply with legal obligations or respond to lawful requests, such as court orders or government requests.
  • In connection with the sale, merger, or acquisition of all or part of our business.

How do we share your personal information?

We may share your personal information with the following third parties:

  • Our cleaning partners
  • Payment processors
  • Email marketing providers
  • Other third-party service providers who help us to provide our services to you

We will not sell or rent your personal information to third parties for their own marketing purposes without your consent.

 

How do we protect your personal information?

We take reasonable steps to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. We have implemented physical, electronic, and administrative security measures to protect your data.

How long do we retain your personal information?

We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide you with doorstep vehicle cleaning services and to comply with our legal obligations.

6. Your Choices

You have the following choices regarding your personal information:

  • You can review, update, or delete your personal information by contacting us.
  • You can opt out of receiving marketing communications from us.

7. Changes to this Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated Privacy Policy on our website.

8. Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at hello@vehiclean.in

 

Privacy & Policies For Cleaning Partners |

Privacy Policy for Cleaning Partners of Vehismart Clean Pvt Ltd

1. Introduction

Welcome to Vehismart Clean Pvt Ltd ("Company," "we," "our," or "us"). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard personal information provided by our cleaning partners (hereinafter referred to as "you" or "your") in the course of your partnership with us.

2. Information We Collect

As part of our partnership, we may collect the following types of information:

a. Personal Information

  • Contact information (such as name, address, email address, and phone number).
  • Identification and background verification information.
  • Police verification
  • Bank cheque as a security for company assets
  • Payment information (such as bank account details for payment processing).
  • Other information relevant to the partnership.

3. How We Use Your Information

We may use your personal information for the following purposes:

  • To facilitate the partnership and provide our cleaning services to customers.
  • To process payments for your services.
  • To communicate with you regarding partnership-related matters.
  • To comply with legal and regulatory obligations.

4. Information Sharing

We may share your personal information with third parties in the following situations:

  • With our customers when necessary to provide cleaning services.
  • With our service providers and partners who assist us in managing our partnership program.
  • To comply with legal obligations or respond to lawful requests, such as court orders or government requests.
  • In connection with the sale, merger, or acquisition of all or part of our business.

5. Data Security

We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access and use.

6. Your Rights and Choices

You have certain rights and choices regarding your personal information:

  • You can review and update your personal information by contacting us.
  • You may have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information, subject to legal restrictions.
  • You can opt out of receiving certain communications from us.

7. Changes to this Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by providing notice through our partnership portal or other means.

8. Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at hello@vehiclean.in
